isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - POWER DISTRIBUTION AND GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - VEHICLE GROUND SYSTEM

svcproc.title: VEHICLE GROUND SYSTEM
svcproc.para: The engine, frame, cab and negative battery terminals are electrically connected by ground cables, which provide common ground points (studs or ground adapters). Refer to 12V POWER DISTRIBUTION- GROUND ADAPTER COMPOSITE and GROUND STUD COMPOSITE circuit diagrams in CTS-5119W or CTS-5273W for ground composites.
